biotools.summary: PhyloPythiaS+ allows the analysis of Gb-sized metagenomes with inexpensive hardware and recovery of species or genera-level bins with low error rates in a fully automated fashion.

bioschemas.name: PhyloPythiaS+
bioschemas.summary: PhyloPythiaS+ allows the analysis of Gb-sized metagenomes with inexpensive hardware and recovery of species or genera-level bins with low error rates in a fully automated fashion.
